survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with AI-Powered Personal Finance Assistants Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of AI-powered personal finance assistants to understand their satisfaction levels, usage patterns, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How often do you use an AI-powered personal finance assistant?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure the options cover all potential usage frequencies.

script.question_text: How often do you use an AI-powered personal finance assistant?

questions.question_text: Which features of your AI-powered personal finance assistant do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-select options. Include an 'Other' option to capture any unlisted features.

script.question_text: Which features of your AI-powered personal finance assistant do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the accuracy of the financial advice provided by your AI-powered personal finance assistant?
questions.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction levels. Ensure the scale is balanced and easy to understand.

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in your AI-powered personal finance assistant?

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in your AI-powered personal finance assistant?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your AI-powered personal finance assistant to others?
questions.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a standard Likert scale for measuring likelihood. This question helps gauge overall satisfaction and potential for word-of-mouth marketing.
